entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Sanirajak
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 9:32 PM EST Sunday 15 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Clear, -40.6°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Sanirajak (Hall Beach Airport) 03:00 AM EST Monday 16 January 2023

Temperature: -40.6°C

Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 63 %

Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Sunday night: Clear. Low minus 41.
